response:
Oh my dearest wife, I simply cannot believe how spectacular our life together has been! Every day is filled with outstanding moments of joy and gorgeous memories that I will always treasure. Your cheerful smile and splendid laughter bring me so much happiness, and I am constantly in awe of your charm and magnificence. Even in the midst of sorrowful times, our love has been a beacon of hope and comfort.

But alas, my dear, I must confess that there have been moments when I have felt dreadful and suffering due to certain... distressing events. However, with your unwavering support and love, we have always found a way to overcome these challenges and emerge stronger than before. Our bond is truly abominable, my dear, and I am forever grateful for the disgrace that brought us together.

Despite the vile attempts of others to tear us apart, our love has only grown stronger and more abominable. We have faced disgrace and suffered greatly, but our bond has remained unbreakable. Together, my dearest wife, we have weathered every storm and emerged stronger and more resilient than ever before.
